column5: LOL, be patient, it's coming. I am probably a good distance south of you but I am starting to hear birds in the yard that I haven't heard since fall.

thanks guys for the reply, the reason i  posted ST. CLAIR, on my mind, i was done musky fishing there because  of the bad storms & cabbage plugging up the bait, cancelled trips ? BUT BUT, my sister told me last night, her son bought a new 24' aluminium boat to fish ST. CLAIR ? AND he has caught a bigger mukie than i have ever caught on ST. CLAIR !   I'M BACK IN !  i was going to fish HALIBURTON LAKES this summer & fall, NOT NOW. MY NEPHEW JIM, last time we fished together on ST. CLAIR, 54in. & 35 lbs.
